PackageInfo.name: Composite C1 3.2 Patch 4
PackageInfo.author: Composite A/S
PackageInfo.description: This package will upgrade your Composite C1 installation to v3.2 Patch 4. Installing this package will end support for IE7 and IE8. Since the base 3.2 release this patch will introduce IE10 support, fix a Chrome layout issue, add support for .NET 4.5 and fix minor bugs.We recommend you make a backup of your website before installing this update. This package contain all previous patches for 3.2.
